name: Cyphers Game
description:
Take on the role of authentic soldiers of the Polish-Bolshevik war of 1920.
Activate complicated communication devices from 100 years ago. See what Bolshevik armored trains looked like up close. This first-person 3D game with stealth elements and complex puzzles will introduce you to the world of the war that defined Europe. Learn more about this little known armed conflict by being the hero of those events.
